attributes.action: Stop plastic pollution in the world
attributes.background: The plastic pollution is killing sea animals and sea birds. this is causing some species of fish, birds, turtles to become endangered

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand that you're concerned about plastic pollution but we're not sure what specific action you want the UK Government to take.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you want "The UK Government to introduce a ban on all non-recyclable packaging from 2022", you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/215000
